input.sentences: this was our groups design chart for the t-shirts that we worked on .
we worked very hard to come up with the unique designs of the t-shirts .
there were some customers who wanted to purchase our t-shirts .
this is a close-up of one the t-shirts with a lot of message on it .
output.sentences: Our second grade class made a chart showing what color shirt to wear to support awareness for violence against women.
We were told to ask our parents to help us made our own unique shirts for school the next day.
I was mad when I found out the next day some kids had just purchased theirs online.
All of the shirts on display in the school had very strong messages.
My friends and I decided we wouldn't commit crimes against women.
